faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Chapiz uses NFC technology to store your pet's information on a chip that can be scanned by any smartphone.
faq.answer2: Yes, we use encryption and privacy controls to protect your pet's information.
faq.question3: What if my pet gets lost?
faq.answer3: Anyone who finds your pet can scan the NFC chip to access your contact information and help reunite you.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.heroDescription: Your privacy and your pet's safety are our top priorities.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.heroDescription: Please read these terms carefully before using Chapiz services.

CookieConsent.title: We use cookies to enhance your experience
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies. You can also choose to reject non-essential cookies.
CookieConsent.privacyNote: You can change your cookie preferences at any time in your account settings.
